name: Loopy Luke
description:
Ludum Dare 47 : Stuck in a Loop

Hi cowboy! 

Welcome in Loopy Luke.
You are stuck on top of a crazy train, surrounded by ennemies
You are now alone with your rifle and the only way to escape this loop is to shoot at targets around you.
Be careful, the train is using coal as power. You will have to focus on your coat gauge if you don't want to stop the train. 
YEEHAWWW !!!

Goal: 
Shoot all targets to reach the next level (5 levels)
Aim: 
Use your computer mouse to aim at targets
Shoot : 
Click on your computer mouse to shoot at targets!

Will you escape this crazy loop ?
